          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Känslor</string>
            <string language="en">Emotions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Émotions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emoções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emozioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκινήσεις</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här finns övningar där man tränar på ord som har med känslor att göra.Modul 5 - Vem är du?Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here are the exercises where you practice on words that have to do with feelings. Module 5 - Who are you? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>

          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sind hier die Übungen, wo Sie auf Wörtern üben,
die Gefühlen miteinbeziehen. Modul 5 - Wer sind Sie? 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici les exercices où vous pratiquez sur les 
mots qui doivent faire avec des sentiments. Module 5 - Qui
êtes-vous ? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estão aqui os exercícios onde você pratica nas 
palavras que têm que fazer com sentimentos. Módulo 5 - 
Quem são você? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui sono le esercitazioni dove vi esercitate in 
sulle parole che riguardano le sensibilità. Modulo 5 - 
Chi sono voi? Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ είναι οι ασκήσεις όπου ασκείτε στις λέξεις που 
πρέπει να κάνουν με τα συναισθήματα. Ενότητα 5 - ποιοι 
είναι εσείς; Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí están los ejercicios donde usted practica 
en las palabras que tienen que hacer con sensaciones. Módulo 5 
- ¿Quiénes son usted? Safir.</string>
          </description>
